QuestData.Title: Requiem for a Queen
QuestData.Description: A chilling breeze sweeps across your body, bringing with it a haunting drape of sadness. Your soul sinks as you hear the faint, melodic cries of Monara, the last Queen of the Mogu.$b$bHer sweet requiem creeps through the air, bending and shaping itself into a spectral hand, reaching for your heart. As it grabs hold, you see a brief flash of Monara's last moments... her brutal murder by the hand of Lei Shen.$b$bSong turns to sadness and Monara weeps, wailing louder and louder into the darkness.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Monara, the last known Queen of the Mogu.
